instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: These be the sons of Leah, which she bare unto Jacob in Padan-aram, with his daughter Dinah: all the souls of his sons and his daughters were thirty and three.
output: و پسران اشیر: یمنه و یشوه و یشوی و بریعه، و خواهر ایشان ساره، وپسران بریعه حابر و ملکیئیل.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest said unto the children of Reuben, and to the children of Gad, and to the children of Manasseh, This day we perceive that the LORD is among us, because ye have not committed this trespass against the LORD: now ye have delivered the children of Israel out of the hand of the LORD.
output: اینک این طوایف را که باقی‌مانده‌اند ازاردن و جمیع طوایف را که مغلوب ساخته‌ام تادریای بزرگ، به سمت مغرب آفتاب برای شما به قرعه تقسیم کرده‌ام تا میراث اسباط شما باشند.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And the angel of the LORD found her by a fountain of water in the wilderness, by the fountain in the way to Shur.
output: و گفت: «ای هاجر کنیز سارای، از کجا آمدی وکجا می‌روی؟» گفت: «من از حضور خاتون خودسارای گریخته‌ام.»

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: In the year of the jubile the field shall return unto him of whom it was bought, even to him to whom the possession of the land did belong.
output: اما هر چیزی که کسی برای خداوند وقف نماید، از کل مایملک خود، چه از انسان چه از بهایم چه از زمین ملک خود، نه فروخته شود و نه فدیه داده شود، زیرا هر‌چه وقف باشد برای خداوند قدس اقداس است.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And the man whose hair is fallen off his head, he is bald; yet is he clean.
output: او مبروص است، ونجس می‌باشد. کاهن البته حکم به نجاست وی بدهد. بلای وی در سرش است.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: I call heaven and earth to witness against you this day, that ye shall soon utterly perish from off the land whereunto ye go over Jordan to possess it; ye shall not prolong your days upon it, but shall utterly be destroyed.
output: زیرا که از ایام پیشین که قبل از تو بوده است از روزی که خدا آدم را برزمین آفرید، و از یک کناره آسمان تا به کناره دیگر بپرس که آیا مثل این امر عظیم واقع شده یا مثل این شنیده شده است؟

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And Joseph brought in Jacob his father, and set him before Pharaoh: and Jacob blessed Pharaoh.
output: یعقوب به فرعون گفت: «ایام سالهای غربت من صد و سی سال است. ایام سالهای عمر من‌اندک و بد بوده است، و به ایام سالهای عمر پدرانم در روزهای غربت ایشان نرسیده.»

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And the angel of the LORD said unto her, I will multiply thy seed exceedingly, that it shall not be numbered for multitude.
output: و فرشته خداوند وی را گفت: «اینک حامله هستی و پسری خواهی زایید، و او را اسماعیل نام خواهی نهاد، زیرا خداوند تظلم تو را شنیده است.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And ye shall observe this thing for an ordinance to thee and to thy sons for ever.
output: گویید این قربانی فصح خداوند است، که از خانه های بنی‌اسرائیل در مصر عبور کرد، وقتی که مصریان را زد و خانه های ما را خلاصی داد.» پس قوم به روی درافتاده، سجده کردند.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And Eleazar the priest said unto the men of war which went to the battle, This is the ordinance of the law which the LORD commanded Moses;
output: «تو و العازار کاهن و سروران خاندان آبای جماعت، حساب غنایمی که گرفته شده است، چه از انسان و چه از بهایم بگیرید.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: The name of the first is Pison: that is it which compasseth the whole land of Havilah, where there is gold;
output: نام اول فیشون است که تمام زمین حویله را که در آنجا طلاست، احاطه می‌کند.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Notwithstanding ye would not go up, but rebelled against the commandment of the LORD your God:
output: لیکن با وجوداین، همه شما به یهوه خدای خود ایمان نیاوردید.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Then shall he that offereth his offering unto the LORD bring a meat offering of a tenth deal of flour mingled with the fourth part of an hin of oil.
output: آنگاه بجهت هدیه آردی، سه عشر آرد نرم مخلوط شده بانصف هین روغن با گاو بگذراند.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And she caught him by his garment, saying, Lie with me: and he left his garment in her hand, and fled, and got him out.
output: مردان خانه راصدا زد، و بدیشان بیان کرده، گفت: «بنگرید، مردعبرانی را نزد ما آورد تا ما را مسخره کند، و نزدمن آمد تا با من بخوابد، و به آواز بلند فریاد کردم،

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And he took up his parable, and said, Rise up, Balak, and hear; hearken unto me, thou son of Zippor:
output: به درستی که بر یعقوب افسون نیست وبر اسرائیل فالگیری نی. درباره یعقوب و درباره اسرائیل در وقتش گفته خواهد شد، که خدا چه کرده است.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And out of the ground the LORD God formed every beast of the field, and every fowl of the air; and brought them unto Adam to see what he would call them: and whatsoever Adam called every living creature, that was the name thereof.
output: و خداوند خدا هر حیوان صحرا و هر پرنده آسمان را از زمین سرشت و نزدآدم آورد تا ببیند که چه نام خواهد نهاد و آنچه آدم هر ذی حیات را خواند، همان نام او شد.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Now all the people that came out were circumcised: but all the people that were born in the wilderness by the way as they came forth out of Egypt, them they had not circumcised.
output: و در فردای آن روزی که از حاصل زمین خوردند، من موقوف شد و بنی‌اسرائیل دیگر من نداشتند، و در آن سال از محصول زمین کنعان می‌خوردند.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And the LORD shall scatter you among the nations, and ye shall be left few in number among the heathen, whither the LORD shall lead you.
output: آیا قومی هرگز آواز خدا را که از میان آتش متکلم شود، شنیده باشند و زنده بمانند، چنانکه تو شنیدی؟

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Moreover your little ones, which ye said should be a prey, and your children, which in that day had no knowledge between good and evil, they shall go in thither, and unto them will I give it, and they shall possess it.
output: پس برگشته، به حضورخداوند گریه نمودید، اما خداوند آواز شما رانشنید و به شما گوش نداد.و در قادش برحسب ایام توقف خود، روزهای بسیار ماندید.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Ye shall observe to do therefore as the LORD your God hath commanded you: ye shall not turn aside to the right hand or to the left.
output: پس یهوه خدای خود را به تمامی جان و تمامی قوت خود محبت نما.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: For all the riches which God hath taken from our father, that is ours, and our children's: now then, whatsoever God hath said unto thee, do.
output: و تمام مواشی واموال خود را که اندوخته بود، یعنی مواشی حاصله خود را که در فدان ارام حاصل ساخته بود، برداشت تا نزد پدر خود اسحاق به زمین کنعان برود.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Every place that the sole of your foot shall tread upon, that have I given unto you, as I said unto Moses.
output: پس یوشع روسای قوم را امر فرموده، گفت:

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And there arose not a prophet since in Israel like unto Moses, whom the LORD knew face to face,
output: هیچکس را در تمامی ایام عمرت یارای مقاومت با تو نخواهد بود. چنانکه با موسی بودم با تو خواهم بود، تو را مهمل نخواهم گذاشت و ترک نخواهم نمود.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And he that stealeth a man, and selleth him, or if he be found in his hand, he shall surely be put to death.
output: اگربرخیزد و با عصا بیرون رود، آنگاه زننده او بی‌گناه شمرده شود، اما عوض بیکاریش را ادا نماید، وخرج معالجه او را بدهد.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And he said unto him, Thou knowest how I have served thee, and how thy cattle was with me.
output: گفت: «پس تو را چه بدهم؟» یعقوب گفت: «چیزی به من مده، اگر این کار را برای من بکنی، بار دیگر شبانی و پاسبانی گله تو را خواهم نمود.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Avenge the children of Israel of the Midianites: afterward shalt thou be gathered unto thy people.
output: و با مدیان به طوری که خداوند موسی را امر فرموده بود، جنگ کرده، همه ذکوران را کشتند.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And he said unto them, Thus saith the LORD God of Israel, Put every man his sword by his side, and go in and out from gate to gate throughout the camp, and slay every man his brother, and every man his companion, and every man his neighbour.
output: و بامدادان واقع شد که موسی به قوم گفت: «شما گناهی عظیم کرده‌اید. اکنون نزد خداوندبالا می‌روم، شاید گناه شما را کفاره کنم.»

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: For I will pass through the land of Egypt this night, and will smite all the firstborn in the land of Egypt, both man and beast; and against all the gods of Egypt I will execute judgment: I am the LORD.
output: هفت روز نان فطیر خورید، در روز اول خمیرمایه را از خانه های خود بیرون کنید، زیرا هر‌که از روز نخستین تا روز هفتمین چیزی خمیرشده بخورد، آن شخص از اسرائیل منقطع گردد.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And Joshua returned, and all Israel with him, unto the camp to Gilgal.
output: پس یوشع گفت: «دهنه مغاره را بگشایید وآن پنج ملک را از مغاره، نزد من بیرون آورید.», پس یوشع باتمامی مردان جنگی به مقابله ایشان نزد آبهای میروم ناگهان آمده، بر ایشان حمله کردند.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And on the fourth day ten bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:
output: ویک بز نر بجهت قربانی گناه، سوای قربانی سوختنی دائمی و هدیه آردی‌اش و هدیه ریختنی آن.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: But the LORD thy God shall deliver them unto thee, and shall destroy them with a mighty destruction, until they be destroyed.
output: و او تو را ذلیل و گرسنه ساخت و من را به تو خورانید که نه تو آن رامی دانستی و نه پدرانت می‌دانستند، تا تو رابیاموزاند که انسان نه به نان تنها زیست می‌کندبلکه به هر کلمه‌ای که از دهان خداوند صادرشود، انسان زنده می‌شود.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And I will make thy seed to multiply as the stars of heaven, and will give unto thy seed all these countries; and in thy seed shall all the nations of the earth be blessed;
output: پس اسحاق در جرار اقامت نمود.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Therefore the people came to Moses, and said, We have sinned, for we have spoken against the LORD, and against thee; pray unto the LORD, that he take away the serpents from us. And Moses prayed for the people.
output: و از آنجا کوچ کرده، به وادی زارد اردو زدند.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And he left off talking with him, and God went up from Abraham.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And when the cloud tarried long upon the tabernacle many days, then the children of Israel kept the charge of the LORD, and journeyed not.
output: و خداوند موسی را خطاب کرده، گفت:

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: But it shall be on the seventh day, that he shall shave all his hair off his head and his beard and his eyebrows, even all his hair he shall shave off: and he shall wash his clothes, also he shall wash his flesh in water, and he shall be clean.
output: و بره را در جایی که قربانی گناه و قربانی سوختنی را ذبح می‌کنند، در مکان مقدس ذبح کند، زیرا قربانی جرم مثل قربانی گناه از آن کاهن است. این قدس اقداس است.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Besides the cakes, he shall offer for his offering leavened bread with the sacrifice of thanksgiving of his peace offerings.
output: و باقی گوشت ذبیحه در روز سوم به آتش سوخته شود.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And the LORD's anger was kindled against Israel, and he made them wander in the wilderness forty years, until all the generation, that had done evil in the sight of the LORD, was consumed.
output: و تا هر یکی ازبنی‌اسرائیل ملک خود را نگرفته باشد، به خانه های خود مراجعت نخواهیم کرد.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Ye shall not therefore oppress one another; but thou shalt fear thy God: for I am the LORD your God.
output: پس در سال ششم برکت خود را بر شما خواهم فرمود، و محصول سه سال خواهد داد.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And Cainan lived after he begat Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begat sons and daughters:
output: و قینان بعد از آوردن مهللئیل، هشتصد و چهل سال زندگانی کرد و پسران و دختران آورد.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And the LORD spake unto me, saying,
output: پس از برادران خود بنی عیسوکه در سعیر ساکنند، از راه عربه از ایلت و عصیون جابر عبور نمودیم.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Notwithstanding the cities of the Levites, and the houses of the cities of their possession, may the Levites redeem at any time.
output: از او ربا و سود مگیر و ازخدای خود بترس، تا برادرت با تو زندگی نماید.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And Pharaoh called Abram, and said, What is this that thou hast done unto me? why didst thou not tell me that she was thy wife?
output: و فرعون ابرام را خوانده، گفت: «این چیست که به من کردی؟ چرا مرا خبرندادی که او زوجه توست؟

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: The length of one curtain shall be thirty cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: and the eleven curtains shall be all of one measure.
output: وپنجاه تکمه برنجین بساز، و تکمه‌ها را در مادگیهابگذران، و خیمه را با هم پیوسته ساز تا یک باشد.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: The LORD shall smite thee with a consumption, and with a fever, and with an inflammation, and with an extreme burning, and with the sword, and with blasting, and with mildew; and they shall pursue thee until thou perish.
output: خداوند تو را به دیوانگی و نابینایی و پریشانی دل مبتلا خواهد ساخت.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And he gathered unto him the children of Ammon and Amalek, and went and smote Israel, and possessed the city of palm trees.
output: و ایهود دست چپ خود را دراز کرده، خنجر را از ران راست خویش کشید و آن را در شکمش فرو برد.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And the children of Israel saw the face of Moses, that the skin of Moses' face shone: and Moses put the vail upon his face again, until he went in to speak with him.
output: درروز سبت آتش در همه مسکنهای خودمیفروزید.»

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Every place whereon the soles of your feet shall tread shall be yours: from the wilderness and Lebanon, from the river, the river Euphrates, even unto the uttermost sea shall your coast be.
output: آیا آنها به آنطرف اردن نیستند پشت راه غروب آفتاب، در زمین کنعانیانی که در عربه ساکنند مقابل جلجال نزد بلوطهای موره.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And Judah saw there a daughter of a certain Canaanite, whose name was Shuah; and he took her, and went in unto her.
output: وبار دیگر آبستن شده، پسری زایید و او را اونان نامید.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: He shall therefore burn that garment, whether warp or woof, in woollen or in linen, or any thing of skin, wherein the plague is: for it is a fretting leprosy; it shall be burnt in the fire.
output: و چون کاهن ملاحظه نماید، اگر بلا بعداز شستن آن کم رنگ شده باشد، پس آن را ازرخت یا از چرم خواه از تار خواه از پود، پاره کند.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: A jubile shall that fiftieth year be unto you: ye shall not sow, neither reap that which groweth of itself in it, nor gather the grapes in it of thy vine undressed.
output: برحسب شماره سالهای بعد ازیوبیل، از همسایه خود بخر و برحسب سالهای محصولش به تو بفروشد.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And if any beast, of which ye may eat, die; he that toucheth the carcase thereof shall be unclean until the even.
output: خویشتن رابه هر حشراتی که می‌خزد مکروه مسازید، و خودرا به آنها نجس مسازید، مبادا از آنها ناپاک شوید.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: For the LORD had fast closed up all the wombs of the house of Abimelech, because of Sarah Abraham's wife.
output: و خداوند برحسب وعده خود، ازساره تفقد نمود، و خداوند، آنچه به ساره گفته بود، بجا آورد.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And he lighted the lamps before the LORD; as the LORD commanded Moses.
output: و پرده دروازه مسکن راآویخت.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And Beth-arabah, and Zemaraim, and Bethel,
output: و قرعه دومین برای شمعون برآمد، یعنی برای سبط بنی شمعون برحسب قبایل ایشان، و ملک ایشان در میان ملک بنی یهودا بود.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Then Moses stood in the gate of the camp, and said, Who is on the LORD's side? let him come unto me. And all the sons of Levi gathered themselves together unto him.
output: و موسی گفت: «امروزخویشتن را برای خداوند تخصیص نمایید. حتی هر کس به پسر خود و به برادر خویش، تا امروزشما را برکت دهد.»

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Wherefore ye shall do my statutes, and keep my judgments, and do them; and ye shall dwell in the land in safety.
output: و در سال هشتم بکارید واز محصول کهنه تا سال نهم بخورید. تا حاصل آن برسد، کهنه را بخورید.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Then we turned, and went up the way to Bashan: and Og the king of Bashan came out against us, he and all his people, to battle at Edrei.
output: و تمامی بهایم و غنیمت شهرها را برای خود به غارت بردیم.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: The soul which hath touched any such shall be unclean until even, and shall not eat of the holy things, unless he wash his flesh with water.
output: هیچ غریبی چیز مقدس نخورد، و مهمان کاهن ومزدور او چیز مقدس نخورد.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: From thence it passed toward Azmon, and went out unto the river of Egypt; and the goings out of that coast were at the sea: this shall be your south coast.
output: و این حد به سوی شمال از جانب عقرون بیرون آمد، و تا شکرون کشیده شد، و از کوه بعله گذشته، نزد یبنئیل بیرون آمد، و انتهای این حد دریا بود.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Thou shalt not remove thy neighbour's landmark, which they of old time have set in thine inheritance, which thou shalt inherit in the land that the LORD thy God giveth thee to possess it.
output: و چون بقیه مردمان بشنوند، خواهند ترسید، و بعد از آن مثل این کار زشت درمیان شما نخواهند کرد.و چشم تو ترحم نکند، جان به عوض جان، و چشم به عوض چشم، و دندان به عوض دندان، و دست به عوض دست و پا به عوض پا.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And he charged them, and said unto them, I am to be gathered unto my people: bury me with my fathers in the cave that is in the field of Ephron the Hittite,
output: آنجا ابراهیم و زوجه‌اش، ساره رادفن کردند؛ آنجا اسحاق و زوجه او رفقه را دفن کردند؛ و آنجا لیه را دفن نمودم.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Unto these the land shall be divided for an inheritance according to the number of names.
output: اینانند قبایل لاویان: قبیله لبنیان و قبیله حبرونیان و قبیله محلیان و قبیله موشیان و قبیله قورحیان. اما قهات، عمرام را آورد.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: And these are the names of the sons of Aaron; Nadab the firstborn, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
output: وایشان شعائر او و شعائر تمامی جماعت را پیش خیمه اجتماع نگاه داشته، خدمت مسکن را بجاآورند.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: But I will for their sakes remember the covenant of their ancestors, whom I brought forth out of the land of Egypt in the sight of the heathen, that I might be their God: I am the LORD.
output: و اگر برآورد تو بجهت ذکور، از بیست ساله تاشصت ساله باشد، برآورد تو پنجاه مثقال نقره برحسب مثقال قدس خواهد بود.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in English, and your task is to translate it into Persian.
input: Over against the border were the rings, the places for the staves to bear the table.
output: و چراغدان را از طلای خالص ساخت. ازچرخکاری، چراغدان را ساخت، و پایه‌اش وشاخه هایش و پیاله هایش و سیبهایش و گلهایش از همین بود.
